message: OpenAPI spec must define at least one server in the 'servers' array.
Security scheme 'BearerToken' is defined in components.securitySchemes but not used in any security requirement.
Servers must be a non-empty array. [path: servers]
`/.well-known/openid-configuration/` should not have a trailing slash. [path: paths./.well-known/openid-configuration/]
`/api/` should not have a trailing slash. [path: paths./api/]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/.get.summary]
`/api/v1/` should not have a trailing slash. [path: paths./api/v1/]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/configmaps.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/endpoints.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/events.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/limitranges.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/namespaces.get.summary]
Operation object should contain `summary` field. [path: paths./api/v1/namespaces.post.summary]
